message_1: An encrypted message contains the following frequencies of letters: A-10, B-15, C-5, D-20, E-30, F-7, G-8, H-12, I-18, J-2, K-1. What is the most likely letter to appear in the message and what is its frequency if frequency analysis is applied?
message_2: If frequency analysis is applied, the most likely letter to appear in the message is the one with the highest frequency. In this case, the letter E has the highest frequency of 30.
